sentence.Network_en: You need to become fully conversant with the company's procedures.
sentence.Network_cn: 你得对公司的程序了如指掌。

sentence.Network_en: Those in business are not, on the whole, conversant with basic scientific principles.
sentence.Network_cn: 总的来说，那些从商的人并不太熟悉基本的科学原理。

sentence.Network_en: Mr. Taylor is thoroughly conversant with modern music.
sentence.Network_cn: 泰勒先生对现代音乐很精通.

在对话（Conversation）部分，你可以看到朋友和来自粉丝（这些粉丝也在同一时候签到）的评论。由于用户可以进行实时对话，这 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, present participle of converser (see converse). The original sense was 'habitually spending time in a particular place or with a particular person'

entry.def: If you are conversant with something, you are familiar with it and able to deal with it.

example.ex: Those in business are not, on the whole, conversant with basic scientific principles.
example.tran: 总的来说，那些从商的人并不太熟悉基本的科学原理。

means.word_mean: 1. (usually followed by `with') well informed about or knowing thoroughly;

auth_sentence.content: On marshy...grounds, where they are conversant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On marshy...grounds, where they are conversant.

auth_sentence.content: Those...conversant with dynamics of glacier motion.
auth_sentence.res_content: Those...conversant with dynamics of glacier motion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Those...conversant with dynamics of glacier motion.

auth_sentence.content: Not all are conversant with all the 'fractals' associated with it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not all are conversant with all the 'fractals' associated with it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not all are conversant with all the 'fractals' associated with it.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的

a坏+vers转+e→往坏转→反感的
con一起+verse=vers转+ant……的→在一起转→很熟悉的
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
di分开+vers转+e→转开了→不同的
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的
ir不+reversible[adj.可逆的]→adj.不可逆转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚愎自用的,故意作对的

re反+vers转+e→反转的
reverse反转的+ible可..的→可反转的,可逆的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 横向的, 横断的, 截线的
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans横+vers转+al……的→adj.横向的, 横断的, 截线的 n.[数学]截线, 横肌

stems_affixes.word_buile: universe[n.宇宙,万物]+al表形容词→宇宙的→普遍的, 全体的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通用的;多才多艺的,多方面的

vers转+ed……的→转过的,已经熟练了→熟练的
adverse[adj.逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的]+ary人→n.对手,敌手
adverse[adj.逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的]+ity表名词→n.不幸,灾难
anni=ann+vers转+ary表名词→一年转到一次→周年纪念日
averse[adj.厌恶的,反对的]+ion表名词→n.嫌恶,憎恨
converse[v.谈话,交谈,认识]+ation表名词→n.会话,谈话
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
con共同+vers转+ion表名词→n.转变,转换;信仰的改变

stems_affixes.value_cn: 转向,转移;牵制;解闷;娱乐

diverse多样的+ity表名词→n.多样,变化万千
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 腐败行为, 渎职, 贪污, 盗用
stems_affixes.word_buile: mal坏+vers转+ation表名词→转坏了→做官做坏
perverse[adj.刚愎自用的,故意作对的]+ity表名词→n.刚愎,背理行为
trans横+vers转+al……的→adj.横向的, 横断的, 截线的 n.[数学]截线, 横肌
uni一个+vers转+e→统一旋转,宇宙
universe[n.宇宙,万物]+ity表名词→由宇宙引申为知识,知识之地→大学

stems_affixes.value_cn: 多才多艺;用途广泛,万能
stems_affixes.word_buile: versatile[adj.通用的;多才多艺的,多方面的]+ity表名词→n.多才多艺;用途广泛,万能
vers转+e→转着反复说的话
vers转+ion表名词→从原文转过来的→译文
diverse多样的+ify……化→v.使不同;[使]多样化
